getRequiredConfigParameterValue

public static Object getRequiredConfigParameterValue(UimaContext context,
                                                     String paramName)
                                              throws ResourceInitializationException
Get a configuration parameter value, raising an exception if it was not specified.

Parameters:
context - The UIMAContext where the parameter should be defined.
paramName - The name of the parameter.
Returns:
The value of the named parameter.
Throws:
ResourceInitializationException

getDefaultingConfigParameterValue

public static Object getDefaultingConfigParameterValue(UimaContext context,
                                                       String paramName,
                                                       Object defaultValue)
                                                throws ResourceInitializationException
Get a configuration parameter value, supplying a default if it was not specified.

Parameters:
context - The UIMAContext where the parameter should be defined.
paramName - The name of the parameter.
defaultValue - The value to use if the parameter was not specified.
Returns:
The value of the named parameter.
Throws:
ResourceInitializationException

createJCasView

public static JCas createJCasView(CAS cas,
                                  String viewName)
                           throws CollectionException
Create a JCas view from a CAS for a given view name.

Parameters:
cas - The CAS object from which the JCas view should be derived.
viewName - The name of the JCas view. If null, the default JCas view will be returned instead. (No new view will be created.)
Returns:
The JCas view.
Throws:
CollectionException
